page.title: 12VICAR OF ST. OSYTH
page.content: The vicar of St. Osyth likes living in this area because of the people. He belongs to the Anglican Church and is called Fr. Peter. He has travelled round the world to ten countries and has had a Parish somewhere else. Fr. Peter lives near the Church and says six masses in a week. The number of people who attend mass in a day is usually about fifty-five. While he has been a Vicar in St. Osyth he has served at 789 weddings and 50 baptisms. His favourite T.V. personality is Richard Baker and his favourite sport is Rugby though he never plays. His special place in St. Osyth is Point Clear beach. Fr. Peter is a happy Priest and very cheerful.
